params._account: The address of account to remove.
The address of account to remove.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revertBatch(bytes,uint256).details: If the owner want to revert a sequence of batches by sending multiple transactions,      make sure to revert recent batches first.

params.batchHeader: The header of current batch, see the encoding in comments of `commitBatch`.
params.count: The number of subsequent batches to revert, including current batch.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

isProver(address).notice: Whether an account is a prover.
